page.title: 06COMMUNICATIONS IN THE AREA
page.content: We did a survey in our school on how many children had telephones.359 children were asked and 237 had telephones.We also counted 4 public telephones in 4 squares.These were in Edward Street,Coventry Road,Franklin Road and Poyser Road. We did a survey on the Postal services.We found out where the post boxes and post offices were in four squares.Strangely enough we found only one post office which was at Hill Top. There were five pillar boxes.They were in Coventry Road,Tulliver Road,Bradestone Road,Caldwell Road and Coton Road.There are three collections a day.One collection is in the morning,one early afternoon and one late afternoon.We have two classes of post.First class costs 17pence and second class costs 13pence.
